thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Dollar Slips as Investors Weigh China Trade Issues

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Slips as Investors Weigh China Trade Issues
text:
The dollar slipped Monday, as investors pondered how a trade spat with China will impact the U.S. economy.
The WSJ Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was recently down 0.2% at 83.85.
Policy makers appeared to soften their tone on trade in recent days, after harsher rhetoric roiled markets at the end...
